name: babel-preset-react-hmre
description: Babel preset for React HMR and Error Catching

scripts.release: npm -s run test && npm -s run semantic-release
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.test: babel --presets react,../index test/ | grep "_wrapComponent('Test')(class Test extends React.Component {"

author: Daniel Martinez
